A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Solidly entertaining\, even for a die-hard fan. There are things which don't make sense\, and a few of these are even significant\, but these enigmatic hiccups do not derail the value of the film overall. I will be seeing it a second time. You will want to run to the interwebs to discuss this film with fellow fans. Many new questions are raised\, along with new possibilities. The future for Star Wars...is full of *hope*. Enjoy!
